name: Domestic R&D employees, by selected industry and sex, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2022
description: Domestic R&D employees, by selected industry and sex, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_researchers_including_r_d_scientists_engineers_and_their_managers_
variableMeasured.description: Researchers Including R D Scientists Engineers And Their Managers

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_technicians_and_equivalent_staff
variableMeasured.description: R D Technicians And Equivalent Staff

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_support_staff_clerical_and_other_
variableMeasured.description: R D Support Staff Clerical And Other

variableMeasured.name: field_researchers_with_phd_excluding_md_jd_and_edd_
variableMeasured.description: Researchers With Phd Excluding Md Jd And Edd

notes: Detail across rows may not add to total because of rounding or unavailable NAICS detail for select records beyond the 4-digit industry classification. Detail across columns have been adjusted to add to total. Industry classification is based on dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2023 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2022.
